segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink like it's broken on purpose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing there, foot in the filthy puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't even care, just keeps wiping that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets getting soaked, what a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids, climbing like little thieves for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool's all crooked and unsafe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Boy's hand deep in the jar, probably dirtying everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl begging with her hand out, so entitled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden's neat, but inside it's gross.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing reeks of carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting to get wet too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Ugh, turn off that faucet already.
segments.speaker: PAR
